code: import*as types from'../../constants/constTypes';export var getList=function getList(list){return{type:types.ADD_FAVOURITE_LIST,payload:list};};export var updateList=function updateList(list){return{type:types.CHANGE_FAVOURITE_LIST,payload:list};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return{type:types.ADD_FAVOURITE_ITEM,payload:item};};
